message: I propose we divide the funds with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This offers a reasonable balance considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise with a 80/20 split, considering the decreasing value of money. I think this is a fair offer considering the current situation.
Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose an equal division of the funds. This ensures fairness and takes into account the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
